Option Name: # Interior Fraction CFL: Fraction of all interior lamps that are compact fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Interior Fraction LFL: Fraction of all interior lamps that are linear fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Interior Fraction LED: Fraction of all interior lamps that are light emitting diodes. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Interior Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the interior lighting energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
# Exterior Fraction CFL: Fraction of all exterior lamps that are compact fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Exterior Fraction LFL: Fraction of all exterior lamps that are linear fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Exterior Fraction LED: Fraction of all exterior lamps that are light emitting diodes. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Exterior Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the exterior lighting energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
# Garage Fraction CFL: Fraction of all garage lamps that are compact fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Garage Fraction LFL: Fraction of all garage lamps that are linear fluorescent. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Garage Fraction LED: Fraction of all garage lamps that are light emitting diodes. Lighting not specified as CFL, LFL, or LED is assumed to be incandescent.
# Garage Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the garage lighting energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
